request.description:
## Overview

Retrieves a list of case types from the SmartAdvocate CaseSync API, optionally filtered by case group.

## Query Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `CaseGroup` | string | (Optional) Filters the returned case types by a specific case group. Leave empty to retrieve all case types. |

## Response Format

Returns an array of case type objects.

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `id` | integer | Unique identifier for the case type |
| `description` | string | Human-readable name/description of the case type |

## Example Response

``` json
[
  {
    "id": 1571,
    "description": "3M Earplugs"
  },
  {
    "id": 910,
    "description": "Abilify - Death"
  },
  {
    "id": 911,
    "description": "Abilify - Not Death"
  }
]

 ```

## Authentication

Requires a valid `APIToken` for authorization.

request.description:
Fields:
udfid - optional if you are using udfName field -uses for find particular udf. (don't use udfName if you are using this field)
udfName - optional if you are using udfid field - uses for find udf by name in that case you need to be sure what udf has the unique name.
caseID - required field - uses for find UDF belonging to this particular case
udfValue - required field - Value of UDF
